mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RemoteConfig(name, comment, type, appId, author, defaulted, updateTime) VALUES(#{name}, #{comment}, #{type}, #{appId}, #{author}, #{defaulted},STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4))
mapper.update: UPDATE RemoteConfig SET `name`=#{name},type=#{type},`comment`=#{comment},author=#{author}, updateTime=STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4) WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RemoteConfig WHERE id=#{1} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, b.`name` AS appname, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) subItemsCount FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN Project b ON a.appId = b.id WHERE a.type=#{type}) a where a.appid in (select id from Project where enable=1 and id=#{appId}) ORDER BY updateTime DESC

SELECT a.*, b.`name` AS appname, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) subItemsCount FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN Project b ON a.appId = b.id WHERE a.appId=#{0} or #{0}=0 ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{1},#{2}
SELECT a.* FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN apps b on a.appId = b.id WHERE b.appkey = #{0} ORDER BY a.updateTime DESC
mapper.update: DELETE a.*,b.* FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN RemoteConfigParam b on a.id = b.envid WHERE a.id = #{id}
